actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the enhanced charitable deduction for contributions of food inventory.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Promoting Charitable Actions Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the special rule allowing a tax deduction for charitable contributions of food inventory by certain noncorporate taxpayers.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the enhanced charitable deduction for contributions of food inventory.
